name: Invaders of Space (Aik'sDevTeam)
description:
A space shooter where the player has got to go from point A to point B shooting or dodging enemy ships. 

The enemy ships can be destroyed with a single hit, but the player's ship can also be destroyed after being hit or colliding with ships after 3 times

Review: https://forms.gle/ynojhHysqopr6pLDA
